A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There should be a "wish I could unwatch" option.  There are some many basic plot holes that aren't addressed. Missed opportunities that could have made this a better than average Star Wars movie.

It fails\, generally across the board\, the writing\, direction\, acting. Effects and Music are the two good things from this movie.

This was the beginning of the end for the franchise.

I can only hope that with JJ Abrams back on the helm the 9th movie can have a modicum of redemption.
